sentences.sContent: It would be sheer hypocrisy to pray for success, since I’ve never believed in God.
sentences.sCn: 我从不相信上帝，因此为获成功而祈祷是纯粹的虚伪之举。

remMethod.val: hypo (在…下面) + crisy (看作criticize， 批评) → 在背后批评别人， 当着面却不断夸奖 → 伪善； 虚伪

trans.tranOther: when someone pretends to have certain beliefs or opinions that they do not really have – used to show disapproval
